com.thinkaurelius.titan.diskstorage.util

Class ByteBufferUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thinkaurelius.titan.diskstorage.util.ByteBufferUtil

  • public class ByteBufferUtil
extends Object
    Utility methods for dealing with ByteBuffer.

      • compare

        public static final int compare(ByteBuffer b1,
          ByteBuffer b2)
        Compares two ByteBuffers according to their byte order (and not the byte value).

        Parameters:
        b1 - First ByteBuffer
        b2 - Second ByteBuffer
        Returns:
        a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer as the first argument is less than, equal to, or greater than the second.

        Returns:
        hashcode for given ByteBuffer
